title: text, use quotes if contains commas
Open Hacks: Build on Okto in Regional Hackathons
description: Encourage developers at regional hackathons to build using Okto SDK. Submitted projects will be evaluated monthly, and top projects will be rewarded and featured on our showcase page. Winning projects gain visibility within the Okto ecosystem and may receive additional funding for further development.
outcomes: Functional project built using Okto SDK with good UI,deployed with a demo,Short write-up (500+ words) on how Okto was used,Submission via form
successCriteria: Project must be fully functional and deployed,Clear use case demonstrating Okto SDK’s capabilities,Engaging UI/UX for a seamless user experience,Quality technical write-up explaining integration details
prerequisites: Basic understanding of Okto SDK,Experience with smart contracts and frontend development
mentor: To Be Assigned:DevRel Team:Communication via Discord

title: Gasless Transaction Demo
description: Build a simple dApp using Okto’s Gas Abstraction features, allowing users to send transactions without needing gas tokens.
skillsRequired: Web3 development, Okto SDK, Ethereum smart contracts
outcomes: Fully functional dApp showcasing gasless transactions, Step-by-step documentation and video tutorial, and Open-source code on GitHub, Code show gas abstraction in two ways - gas sponsored for the user and user can pay gas in any available token
successCriteria: Must successfully process gasless transactions using Okto’s API, Clear and easy-to-follow documentation, Code is reviewed and approved by Okto team.
prerequisites: Familiarity with smart contract development, Basic understanding of okto sdk
mentor: To Be Assigned:DevRel Team:Communication via Discord

title: Okto Pay: Merchant Integration Plugin
description: Build a WooCommerce/Shopify plugin enabling merchants to accept crypto payments via Okto.
skillsRequired: Web3 payments, eCommerce integration, API development
outcomes: A working WooCommerce/Shopify plugin, User documentation & integration guide, Open-source code for further development
successCriteria: Successfully processes crypto payments via Okto, Seamless integration with WooCommerce/Shopify, Well-documented and developer-friendly code
prerequisites: Experience with WooCommerce or Shopify plugin development, Familiarity with Okto APIs
timeline: Planning & Research:1 weeks:Understand WooCommerce & Shopify payment systems and Okto APIs;Development:3 weeks:Build and test the plugin;Documentation & Deployment:2 week:Create integration guide and open-source repository
mentor: To Be Assigned:DevRel Team:Communication via Discord

title: Voice-Controlled dApp Interactions
description: Develop a voice assistant that enables users to perform Okto Intents using voice commands.
outcomes: AI model for voice-based Web3 interactions, Supports key functions like wallet balance, swaps, and staking, Open-source GitHub repo
successCriteria: Accurately executes voice commands for Web3 functions, Seamless integration with Okto dApps, Well-documented and developer-friendly implementation
prerequisites: Experience with NLP and voice recognition, Familiarity with Okto APIs and dApp development
timeline: Research & Model Selection:2 weeks:Choose NLP and voice recognition model;Prototype Development:3 weeks:Implement basic voice commands for Web3 functions;Testing & Optimization:2 weeks:Improve accuracy and latency;Final Deployment:1 week:Open-source and document
mentor: To Be Assigned:DevRel Team:Communication via Discord

title: Okto SDK Playground
description: A web-based interactive playground where developers can test Okto SDK functions without setting up a local environment.
outcomes: Hosted web app where developers can interact with Okto SDK APIs, Pre-configured sandbox environment, Sample transactions and wallet interactions, Open-source repo for community contributions
successCriteria: Seamless integration with Okto SDK, User-friendly and intuitive UI, Well-documented for community use and contributions
prerequisites: Familiarity with frontend and backend development, Experience with Web3 libraries like Viem or ethers.js, Understanding of API interactions
timeline: Planning & Design:2 weeks:Define UI/UX and key functionalities;Development Phase:4 weeks:Implement core features and sandbox setup;Testing & Optimization:2 weeks:Refine UI, fix bugs, and enhance user experience;Launch & Open-source:1 week:Deploy app and release GitHub repo
mentor: To Be Assigned:DevRel Team:Communication via Discord

title: Okto CLI
description: A CLI tool that allows developers to quickly instantiate an Okto template repo for JS-based platforms, similar to Create-React-App. This will streamline onboarding and setup for Okto SDK integration.
skillsRequired: Node.js, CLI development, JavaScript/TypeScript, Shell scripting, Package management (npm/yarn), Okto SDK integration
outcomes: A working CLI tool that can generate Okto-based project templates for React, Next.js, and other JS frameworks based on user input, Handles dependencies, project structure, and initial configuration, Open-source with documentation and installation guide
successCriteria: Seamless project setup with Okto SDK, Easy-to-use CLI commands with clear instructions, Well-documented and tested for various use cases
prerequisites: Experience with CLI development, Understanding of JavaScript frameworks, Familiarity with Okto SDK
timeline: Planning & Design:2 weeks:Define CLI commands and project structure;Development Phase:4 weeks:Implement template generation and dependency management;Testing & Refinements:2 weeks:Ensure stability and compatibility across frameworks;Launch & Open-source:1 week:Release on GitHub with installation guide
mentor: To Be Assigned:DevRel Team:Communication via Discord

title: Okto Idea Board
description: A web app/mobile app where developers can browse, claim, and contribute to Okto-related bounties and projects. Gamified with a contribution tracker. Users log in via Google Auth and Okto wallet, claim tasks, and showcase their contributions in a visual GitHub-style heatmap.
skillsRequired: React, Node.js, Firebase/Auth0, Web3.js/Viem, Okto SDK, UI/UX Design
outcomes: Web app with Okto wallet login & Google Auth integration, Task board where users can claim bounties/projects, Contribution profile with GitHub-style heatmap visualization, Gamification elements (leaderboard, badges, Okto Points system), Open-source repo with community contribution guidelines, Reward system integrated for automated airdrops
successCriteria: Seamless login and onboarding experience, Fully functional task board with claim and submission features, Interactive contribution tracker with heatmap, Engaging gamification and reward system, Active community contributions to open-source repo
prerequisites: Experience with web app development, Familiarity with authentication and Web3 wallet integrations, Knowledge of gamification techniques
timeline: Planning & Design:2 weeks:Define user flows and wireframes;Development Phase 1:3 weeks:Implement login, task board, and claiming system;Development Phase 2:3 weeks:Build contribution tracking and heatmap;Gamification & Reward System:2 weeks:Integrate leaderboard, badges, and Okto Points;Testing & Launch:2 weeks:Bug fixes, optimizations, and deployment
mentor: To Be Assigned:DevRel Team:Communication via Discord

title: Okto Job Explorer for UUID-based Searching
description: A lightweight explorer focused on job and intents done via Okto wallets, helping developers debug and analyze interactions. Features UUID-based search for nonce, job ID, and can search client and user swaps.
skillsRequired: Blockchain indexing, APIs, Full-stack web development, Okto SDK, Database management
outcomes: Web-based explorer that indexes Okto transactions, Search functionality for clientSWA, userSWA, wallet addresses for all network IDs, transaction hash, and contract interactions, UUID-based lookup for job ID and nonce, Open-source repo for custom integrations
successCriteria: Accurate indexing of Okto transactions, Fast and reliable search functionality, User-friendly UI for developers, Open-source contributions for expanding features
prerequisites: Experience with blockchain explorers, Familiarity with indexing and database optimization, Understanding of Okto SDK and transaction structures
timeline: Planning & Design:2 weeks:Define architecture and data structures;Backend Development:3 weeks:Build indexer and API endpoints;Frontend Development:3 weeks:Implement search interface and UI;Testing & Optimization:2 weeks:Improve search speed and fix bugs;Launch & Documentation:2 weeks:Deploy and provide integration guides
mentor: To Be Assigned:DevRel Team:Communication via Discord

title: GitHub Contributions - Error Messaging
description: Developers can contribute to improving error messaging across Okto SDKs, making them clearer and more actionable for other developers.
skillsRequired: TypeScript, JavaScript, SDK debugging, Error handling best practices, Git/GitHub
outcomes: Improved and more descriptive error messages in Okto SDKs, PRs merged into the main repo, Documentation updates where necessary
successCriteria: Clear and actionable error messages, Approved PRs following Okto’s coding guidelines, Positive feedback from developers on error clarity
prerequisites: Familiarity with Okto SDK, Experience in debugging and handling errors, Understanding of best practices for error messaging
mentor: To Be Assigned:DevRel Team:Communication via Discord

title: Okto Docs Contributions
description: Contribute to improving Okto’s documentation at docs.okto.tech. This includes fixing typos, improving clarity, adding new sections, and enhancing developer guides.
skillsRequired: Markdown, Technical Writing, API Documentation, Git/GitHub
outcomes: Enhanced and clearer documentation, Contributions merged into the main docs repo, Better developer onboarding experience
successCriteria: Well-structured and clear documentation improvements, Approved PRs following Okto’s contribution guidelines, Positive feedback from developers
prerequisites: Familiarity with Okto SDK and documentation structure, Follow contribution guidelines at https://github.com/okto-hq/okto-sdk-docs-v2/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md
mentor: To Be Assigned:DevRel Team:Communication via Discord

title: Okto Issue Reporting
description: Report valid issues or bugs in Okto SDKs, documentation, or template apps. Bonus rewards for contributing a fix via a PR.
skillsRequired: Debugging, TypeScript/JavaScript, Markdown, Git/GitHub, Web3 Development
outcomes: Identified and documented valid issues, Merged fixes improving Okto SDKs, docs, or templates
successCriteria: Issue must be reproducible and well-documented, Fixes must be accepted and merged following contribution guidelines
prerequisites: Basic understanding of Okto SDK and relevant tech stack, Follow contribution guidelines at https://github.com/okto-hq/okto-sdk-docs-v2/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md
mentor: To Be Assigned:DevRel Team:Communication via Discord

title: Fix Open Issues in Okto's public Repos
description: Contribute by fixing open issues in Okto SDKs, documentation, or template apps. Submit a PR following Okto's contribution guidelines for review and approval.
skillsRequired: TypeScript, JavaScript, Markdown, Git/GitHub, SDK debugging, Web3 development
outcomes: Merged PR fixing an issue in Okto SDKs, docs, or template apps
successCriteria: PR must address an open issue, Follow Okto’s contribution guidelines, Code must pass review and be merged
prerequisites: Familiarity with Okto SDK, Ability to troubleshoot and fix issues, Follow contribution guidelines at https://github.com/okto-hq/okto-sdk-docs-v2/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md
mentor: To Be Assigned:DevRel Team:Communication via Discord

title: Help Developers: Answer Okto SDK Questions
description: Assist developers by providing well-explained answers to Okto SDK-related queries in GitHub Discussions or the Okto Discord. High-quality responses that add value and clarity will be rewarded.
skillsRequired: Web3 development, Okto SDK, JavaScript/TypeScript, Problem-solving, Communication
outcomes: Accepted answer that helps resolve a developer’s query
successCriteria: Response must be detailed, accurate, and actionable, Must be acknowledged as helpful by the original poster or Okto team
prerequisites: Familiarity with Okto SDK, Active participation in GitHub Discussions or Okto Discord
mentor: To Be Assigned:DevRel Team:Communication via Discord

title: Comprehensive Okto SDK Tutorial Series
description: Create a step-by-step tutorial series covering all aspects of building with Okto SDK, including setup, key functionalities, and best practices. Tutorials should be detailed, beginner-friendly, and include code snippets. It should have a build in public video and a blog explainng the steps with links
skillsRequired: Technical writing, Web3 knowledge, Okto SDK experience, JavaScript/TypeScript, Markdown
outcomes: tutorials with code examples, GitHub repositories, and troubleshooting sections for each okto sdk quickstart, should show  set up installations and end to end execution of an intent successfully
successCriteria: Tutorials must be clear, structured, and provide working examples, Content should be original and well-documented, Must be reviewed and approved by Okto DevRel team
prerequisites: Experience with Okto SDK, Ability to create structured educational content
mentor: To Be Assigned:DevRel Team:Communication via Discord

title: Web3-ify Any Open Source web2 App with Okto SDK
description: Transform any open-source Web2 application of your choice by integrating the Okto SDK to add meaningful blockchain functionality. Choose from popular open-source projects and implement features like cross-chain authentication, token-gated access, NFT integration, or decentralized payments that enhance the application's core value proposition. Your integration should demonstrate how Okto's chain abstraction makes Web3 features accessible without complicating the user experience.
skillsRequired: Web development (framework varies by project), Okto SDK, basic Web3 concepts, UX design principles
outcomes: 1. Working fork of chosen open-source app with Okto SDK integration, 2. At least 2 meaningful Web3 features implemented, 3. 5-10 minute demo video showcasing the integration, 4. Written case study detailing implementation process and impact
successCriteria: Project must be functional and user-friendly, Integration should enhance the app’s value without disrupting UX, Clear documentation and demo required, Must be reviewed and approved by Okto DevRel team
prerequisites: Familiarity with chosen open-source app, Basic understanding of Web3 features and Okto SDK
timeline: Initial Planning:1 week:Select and propose an open-source app; Development:3 weeks:Integrate Okto SDK and implement features; Testing & Documentation:2 weeks:Refine, document, and create demo video
mentor: To Be Assigned:DevRel Team:Communication via Discord
